Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Oatmeal \Oat"meal`\, n. 1. Meal made of oats. --Gay. [1913 Webster]
2. (Bot.) A plant of the genus {Panicum}; panic grass. [1913 Webster]
oatmeal n 1: porridge made of rolled oats [syn: {burgoo}] 2: meal made from rolled or ground oats [syn: {rolled oats}]
